trans-unit.source: The source of the event, an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs" /> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventArgs" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand" /> event of an <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" />.
trans-unit.target: 代表將處理 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList" /> 的 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ItemCommand" /> 事件之方法。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see <see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET</see>.
trans-unit.target: 如需如何開發 ASP.NET 行動應用程式的資訊，請參閱<see href="https://docs.microsoft.com/aspnet/mobile/overview">使用 ASP.NET 來開發行動應用程式與網站</see> (機器翻譯)。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventHandler> delegate for an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandEventHandler>委派<xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>必須識別處理事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> notifies the handler when an item event is generated.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>時產生的項目事件通知的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。

trans-unit.source: Unless you remove the delegate, the event handler is called whenever the event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除委派，否則每次發生事件時都會呼叫事件處理常式。
